snippet: Over all, in terms of total viewers, the ratings for the speech were down on most of the networks that carried it, but CNN's viewership was up sharply, gaining 36 percent over the audience that viewed the speech a year ago.
abstract: Over all, in terms of total viewers, the ratings for the speech were down on most of the networks that carried it, but CNN's viewership was up sharply, gaining 36 percent over the audience that viewed the speech a year ago.

headline.main: Manhunt and Obama's Address Bolster CNN's Ratings
